subtitle: About Me!
content: I'm an ex-ship captain turned to the Front-End developer who has a passion for new technologies. Recently, I graduated from Re:Coded bootcamp and I learned JavaScript and React. Currently, I'm a Global ambassador on Wanchain, a blockchain company where I'm giving feedback on products and improving the community with the content I created.

subtitle: Experience!
content: I made projects in JavaScript and React. Check my experience section to see what they are
